name: Zip Zap Zonked
overview: Zip Zap Zonked is a 2-player arcade game. In the mysterious eighth dimension, where all matter exists as light, the powerful knight Tanglor and his nemesis, Prince Puzlor, begin their joust for power. Each player controls a spaceship that moves in all directions. When the player presses the joystick a laser beam is created from the prior laser position, creating a long series of criss-crossing beams. The players can safely move through their own beams, and gain a point if the enemy hits their beam.
